item.title: A 'Release & Distribution' category?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
I’d disagree that music/artist promotion is a sub-topic of music production.
It’s more about building a profile, an audience and maybe a career from the music you’ve made, rather than how to make or shape the music itself.
It’s an optional, but distinct, next step after making music, not a step within making music.

Besides, Lenberg hasn’t enabled sub-categories here, but either way, I’d see ‘production’ and ‘release/promotion’ as sibling (sub-)categories.

Read full topic

item.title: A 'Release & Distribution' category?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
More about how and where to release, the process, etc… as well as other considerations.

I wouldn’t consider sharing a track here as ‘releasing’ it, in the serious sense. Sharing a track here is more aimed at discussing the music itself, either simply announcing it (within this small community) or seeking feedback, to appreciate or shape the music itself, so (by my thinking) that stays in Tracks & Collaborations.

Read full topic

item.title: A 'Release & Distribution' category?
item.dc:creator: NEWNAMES
item.description:
akabillposters:

I’d say that’s aimed at the songwriting and production – the actual making of the music.

I’m talking about the next bit, getting it out there. A category dedicated to all forms of release, distribution and promotion, at least, for those who want to take it a bit more seriously.

It would be a category for discussion about stuff about channels/platforms (SoundCloud, Spotify, iTunes, YouTube, etc…), tools and services (LANDR, Amuse.io, tuneCore, etc…), and all the things you need to think/know about when it comes to getting the music out there, including cover artwork, how to build an audience, etc…

It would be more of a subtopic of Production Talk in my opinion.

Read full topic

item.title: A 'Release & Distribution' category?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
NEWNAMES:

Doesn’t this have to do with Production Talk and Tracks and Collaborations categories

I’d say that’s aimed at the songwriting and production – the actual making of the music.

I’m talking about the next bit, getting it out there. A category dedicated to all forms of release, distribution and promotion, at least, for those who want to take it a bit more seriously.

It would be a category for discussion about stuff about channels/platforms (SoundCloud, Spotify, iTunes, YouTube, etc…), tools and services (LANDR, Amuse.io, tuneCore, etc…), and all the things you need to think/know about when it comes to getting the music out there, including cover artwork, how to build an audience, etc…

 

INDIR3CT:

@INDIR3CT

Does this focus more on the non soundcloud side of things? Such as releases through bandcamp, Itunes, Spotify, etc.? If so, this would help a great deal.

I’d say all channels, including SC. Many of us use SC semi-casually, but it’s certainly one channel that can and should play a more serious role in terms of distribution, promotion and presence – for those who want to step things up.

 
Anyway, that’s my thinking.

Read full topic

item.title: A 'Release & Distribution' category?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Wondering if it would be a good idea if the forum had a dedicated ‘Release & Distribution’ category.

There’s a fair amount of discussion about the topic, and there’ll be more and more as members join and progress.

…and it would help establish the topic here as something distinct in the process.

 
@MisterMaster, @xavior, @Auxy…

Thoughts?

Read full topic
